__e: So that's it. Have some cake, have some coffee, because Andrew didn't write a speech for any of this.
Who do you ultimately serve-- yourself, the group, or me?
- I don't smoke. - You can use it to light a fire... under the press back at home.
If you're a magician why do you not use your power to slay the one-eyed monster?
Women, use your brains, not your bodies!
I should be there when this month's issue comes in.
And if by any chance you're not used to using weapons use this, I brought it as a souvenir.
Use your hands and feet and gimme everything you got!
So you can use me all you like, but you can't get to him anymore.
Stay if you want to. You know where the drinks are. You can play my records too if you wish, but as for me, goodbye,
Please, all of you, help yourselves to a drink and have something to eat.
Please, all of you, help yourselves to a drink and have something to eat.

I implore you, take this opportunity to use the innocent apple-pie face and the fine mind God has obviously given you, for something better, for something decent, for all the people whose trust you've crushed.
Of course. - I'm so happy you could join us, I really am.
Go ahead. Take a drink while you're at it.
Listen, help yourselves to a drink, because I've had a thought.
